template project

for this website

Creating this page is a project for itself. I'm using, jekyll, twitter bootstrap, github.pages and webhooks, liquid for designers, jQuery, html5, css3, less, typekit, google analytics, JavaScript and all that other stuff you need to build a website without repeating to much code. Oh just before you ask. I'm no web developer either but there is always the need to publish something on the web and the web talks in the languages mentioned above.
